articles.title: More than 1,000 Afghan troops flee Taliban into Tajikistan - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: More than 1,000 Afghan troops fled into neighbouring Tajikistan in the early hours of Monday after clashes with the Taliban, the Central Asian country
